title: 1000Pcs Glow Stones Glowing in The Dark Pebbles Outdoor Decor Fish Tank Gravel Rocks Decoration (Pink in Daytime, Purple in The Dark)
features: [Easy to use]---The pebbles laying on the edge of the walkway or flower beds, or use it for decorative vases, fish tanks, aquarium landscaping, gardening decoration, swimming pool decoration, bar decoration; villa gardening potting, parks and so on.

[The principle of light]---The pebbles in the absorption of sunlight or light exposure, and they will glows for up to 2-3 hours or more in the dark environment. It can be used repeatedly.Their life expectancy lasts up to 15 years.
[Non-toxic environmentally]---Non-toxic and tasteless, non-radioactive environmentally friendly resin non-mineral products.

[Suggest to charge power with lamp light]---Glow lasts approximately 2-3 hours in the dark after direct sun exposure. Glow around 10 hours if it's lamp light charge power for glow stones. If your rocks in garden not glow, pls set rocks near lamp, Or just use a torch on rocks for few minutes, then it will glow brightly whole night.
[NOTICE]---Prohibit children from playing, Keep away from children for chocking hazard.
description: Make your garden or yard to look different from your neighbors at night with glowing stones! Product features: - Line a walkway, edge a flower bed, decor garden or fish tank with these unique pebbles. - After absorbing light, the pebble will glow brighter within 2-3 hours, and then the brightness will decay quickly. - Pebbles can absorb light repeatedly, and their life expectancy lasts up to 15 years. Specifications: Material: Photoluminescent pigment +Polystyrene Color: Purple Size: 0.8"-1.2"(approx) Package includes: - 1000 × Pebbles Stone(Pink in daytime, Glowing Purple in the dark) HOW TO USE: To glow in the dark, glow stones need charge power with light first. Best power source is lamp light. Charge with lamp light, rocks could glow bright about 10 hours. If charge with sun light, rocks glow around 2-3 hours. If you put rocks in your garden, we advice to put rocks near lamp. Or just use a torch on rocks for few minutes, then rocks will glow brightly whole night. Since if the power source only from sun, light to dusk to dark is such a time lapse that you may not going to see the full glow potential. even may can’t see the rocks glowing. Sure, if put rocks as indoor or aquarium decoration, nothing need worried. It will glow bright the whole night. WARNING: Keep away from children for chocking hazard.
